title: University at Albany
description: The University at Albany boasts a vibrant color palette that represents its brand. The deep purple (#46166B) signifies wisdom and creativity, while the striking gold (#EEB211) evokes a sense of prestige and excellence. Complementary colors such as the warm turquoise (#006C68) and the soft gray (#97A4AF) provide balance and versatility. These colors are detailed in the universityâ€™s Graphic Standards Manual available via their communication and marketing resources.
